price: 50 Regarde comme ils inventent des mensonges qu’ils attribuent à Allah, ce qui constitue un péché suffisamment clair.
arabic: ٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۖ وَكَفَىٰ بِهِۦٓ إِثۡمٗا مُّبِينًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: unẓur kayfa yaftarūna ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wakafā bihi ith'man mubīnan
